descriptionHTML:
Orb Watch Face

The new Orb watch face is carefully designed to display time and data thought wear 2.0 complications, while keeping it simple, elegant and minimalist.

Update Notice:

This app was designed for Android Wear 2.0, but the watch update is taking too long to be released on other wear devices. So we decided to make this watch face compatible with wear < 2.0 with limitations: Complications are displayed but they cannot be changed, nor have a click action. They are described in the end of the this app description.

Wear 2.0 owners can use the new complications feature. You can choose between data providers to select what you want to see in your wrist:

- Date;
- World clock from any location around the globe;
- Battery level;
- Steps;
- Weather information ( you might need to have a weather app installed before this provider works );
- Notifications;
- Calendar events;
- Sunset times;
- App and Contacts shortcut;
- Music currently playing;
- More.

The Orb Watch face is inspired by wear material design, choose between 18 material colors, with 2 different display modes: dark and light to match with your mood;

Complications are only compatible with Android Wear 2.0.

On Android Wear 1.X the "complications" are still displayed, but you cannot change data provider, they are:

- Phone Battery;
- Watch battery:
- Notification count;
- Date

Enjoy.
Learn more about our work: www.pifox.io

If something goes wrong we will be pleased to help you.
comments: I really like it. Just one thing, can you add the ability to have your phone battery show on the face?
Great first start with this new app. I'd like to see the seconds scroll smoothly as well as additional options for displaying time, such as the option to move minutes and seconds to the center.
recentChanges: - Option to keep colors in Ambient mode.
